name: Top Floor
description: Welcome to Top Floor Experience. It is time to enjoy virtual reality and push yourselves beyond the limits. This elevator is going to take you very high above ground. Remember this experience is safe. Relax.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
